title: How I repaired my own heart
description: Tal Golesworthy is a boiler engineer -- he knows piping and plumbing. When he needed surgery to repair a life-threatening problem with his aorta, he mixed his engineering skills with his doctors' medical knowledge to design a better repair job.
author: Tal Golesworthy
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, engineering, health, heart health, innovation, medicine, science, technology, biology, biomechanics, physiology, biotech, design, future, health care, medical research, product design, materials, Surgery, collaboration, disease
